value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse... How are you holding up?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Oh, Sharena... I'm all right. I can
move, at least.$k$p$EFace_Pain|Yet a strange sensation remains...
Like an icy blade plunged into my
chest.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|The death curse of Hel...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Eir, please, tell me what you know.
Anything might help.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|My mother's laws govern death... At
the moment she lays her curse, the
number of the dead is set.$k$pThose she has cursed will die on
their appointed day.$k$pThere is no escaping it...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No! There must— There has to be—
Surely there's a way!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse, the king and queen have
arrived.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, my son...$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So you have been cursed by Hel.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I disobeyed you, Father. I am sorry.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If I may, your majesty... The attack
was sudden. Our scouts never even
saw her.$k$pThey appeared suddenly, like
ghosts... We had no chance to
disengage.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Your mistake was setting foot on
the battlefield at all. This is the
consequence of Alfonse's rashness.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Father... I'm so sorry.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hel... She claimed my father's life,
too...$k$pThere are no options left, Alfonse.
There is no escaping her curse.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gustav! This is our son's life you're
talking about!$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Henriette, please, listen. All of you
must listen to what I say now.$k$pThe royal family of Askr, our family,
has suffered a loss. We must accept
that and move forward.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Father! You can't mean that!$k$pAlfonse is alive! He's right here
beside you! There must be
something we can do...$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Death will not be turned away.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We can't know that unless we try!$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Enough. I will rejoin my forces.
I must consider our next move.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Father...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I have failed you, Father. I am sorry.$k$p$EFace_Cool|But until the moment I die, I will
continue to seek a means of
defeating Hel.$k$pMy only hope is that, in the time I
have left, I can find some way to be
of use...$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Very well.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|We must kill Hel. That is how we
will save Alfonse.$k$pWe're out of options...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Most legends hold that a curse is
broken when the one who laid it is
killed...$k$p$EFace|Princess Eir, if Hel were to die,
what would happen?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I do not know. My mother...has never
been killed.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|That shouldn't stop us from trying!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Not only would killing Hel abate the
threat to Askr, it could save Alfonse.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Keep your eyes peeled, everyone.
Our objective is to find Hel and
eliminate her.$k$p$Sbs1000|
